entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers this morning. A few rain showers or flurries beginning near noon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
